column_description: A unique 15-character identifier for each book, serving as the primary key

column_description: A 4-character code representing the author of the book, linked to the 'Author' table
The price at which the book was purchased, stored as a number with up to 6 digits and 2 decimal places
The price at which the book is sold, stored as a number with up to 6 digits and 2 decimal places
